alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 20 at 3:40AM PST until December 20 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. Isolated temperatures in the mid to upper 20s are possible through the canyons of the Santa Monica Range. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys, Santa Monica Mountains and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys
